name: not nameless cat
description:
Game for "so bad it's good" game jam

In a not-so-distant universe, around a star very similar to our sun, on a planet very similar to our Earth, created naturally like all other similar planets, by a Spaghetti Monster. And out of boredom, he decided to create a magnificent freak: a Man. And as if in contrast to such a poor creature, he created a heavenly creation: a Cat. And he planted a tree of sin, and punished the man, that he should not dare to touch the tree. And he put the cat on guard, hoping to protect the forbidden fruit from the wretched monster. But the man disobeyed,and there was a great punishment for him. Until the end of his days, he was cast down from paradise to earth along with the cat. And a man lived until the end of his days with a cat. And then he died alone. As the years passed, life learned to appear on its own. And so, for many thousands of years, the man with the cat was born again. The human mind did not stand still. And after years of development, human life has become a huge monopoly. At this time, the cat did not develop in any way, but managed to live and moreover live in such conditions that some people do not have. Everyone was happy. But one day...

and remember: never harm animals (especially your own), because Spaghetti Monster is watching us!

if you wanna to support us by some reason: https://vk.com/club194672774

also check game named "nameless cat"
